SOST: Negative regulator of bone growth that acts through inhibition of Wnt signaling and bone formation
TNFRSF11B: Acts as decoy receptor for TNFSF11/RANKL and thereby neutralizes its function in osteoclastogenesis
TNFRSF11A: Receptor for TNFSF11/RANKL/TRANCE/OPGL; essential for RANKL-mediated osteoclastogenesis
TNFSF11: Cytokine that binds to TNFRSF11B/OPG and to TNFRSF11A/RANK
GPC6: Cell surface proteoglycan that bears heparan sulfate
DAAM1: Binds to disheveled (Dvl) and Rho, and mediates Wnt-induced Dvl-Rho complex formation
